content: Too unstable on my device, Sometimes it's a big problem just to upload images or VN'S

OK let's be fair. Slack app is broken. Channels disappear. They used to have a feature to pull down to show you the recent channels you have used and you could at least see the vanished ones by doing this. They removed the feature so it's now literally unusable as half of the channels don't show up.

Update: the desktop (web) app does not show all the send messages in the activities table. Anything sent, should show. Also, when you set a reminder, or schedule a message, it only shows the numerical date as if someone will remember off top the day of week as well.
replyContent: Sorry to hear your app isn't marking messages as read. When you have a moment, please navigate to your app’s "You" tab > "Preferences" > "Send Feedback" to flag this with our support team. We’ll be happy to help!

Great for keeping track of birthdays and organizing gatherings for friends and family. I'd give it five stars, except the full range of features are only available by paying a monthly fee for every user. Great if you're a for-profit company but less than ideal if you're not. I'd be happy to pay a small fee for the account managers but that's not an option.
works well. my main source of comms. replaces email.
App not download in my mobile
replyContent: Sorry for the troubles you're experiencing, that definitely sounds unusual. We'd love to dig deeper into this for you, we'll need some further details to better assist. Mind reaching out to us at feedback@slack.com so we can look into this?
